original_title: Metallica - Live at Outside Lands (San Francisco, CA - August 12, 2017)
overview: Continuing their #MetallicaMondays YouTube series, Metallica streamed the band's August 12th, 2017 show at the Outside Lands Music & Arts Festival at Golden Gate Park in San Francisco, CA on April 13th. It features an intro by drummer Lars Ulrich.
title: Metallica - Live at Outside Lands (San Francisco, CA - August 12, 2017)
